examples.sentence: She is a shopaholic who spends almost all of her money on clothes and shoes.
My sister is a shopaholic who always buys more clothes than she needs, and she only wears them once.
Her shopping habit is to buy only what she needs and avoid impulse purchases.
My shopping habit changed during the pandemic and I started ordering more things online.
The supermarket offers a variety of products at competitive prices.
The supermarket is having a major sale this weekend.
I found a beautiful dress for the wedding at the department store in the mall.
The department store's return policy allows you to return clothes within 30 days with a receipt.
I love going to the shopping mall to shop for clothes because there's such a wide variety of stores to choose from.
The shopping mall's clothing stores cater to a wide range of styles and preferences, from casual to formal wear.
You can easily spend an entire day at the shopping mall browsing through tens of clothing stores.
The boutique owner was so helpful in finding me the perfect outfit for my friend's wedding.
Boutiques always have the latest fashion trends and styles, which is why I love shopping at them.
This boutique has a great mix of classic and modern styles that really suit my taste.
In-store shopping for clothes allows me to get a better sense of the fabric and texture of items.
I prefer to try on clothes in-store to ensure the fit and quality meet my expectations.

translations.meaning: nền tảng mua sắm trực tuyến

examples.sentence: I love the convenience of shopping for clothes on an online shopping platform and having them delivered directly to my house.
I prefer to use an online shopping platform for clothes shopping because I can easily browse and compare different brands and prices.
The online shopping platform I use can suggest clothes based on my browsing history.
The chain store's clothes are known for their quality and durability, which is why I keep going back.
The chain store usually offers a loyalty program that rewards you with discounts and other benefits.
I often shop at the chain store for clothes because they offer affordable prices and a wide selection.
The duty-free store often has exclusive clothing items that you won't find at regular retail stores.
Shopping for clothes at the duty-free store is a great way if you're traveling to another country.
I bought a dress that was on sale for 50% off its original price.
He missed the opportunity to buy the shoes he liked because they were on sale only for one day.
The clothing store is currently offering a special offer on summer dresses, with prices up to 50% off.
It's worth asking the clothing store's staff if there are any special offers available, as they may not always be advertised.
I love to go window shopping for clothes on my lunch break, just to see what's new in the stores.
Window shopping for clothes is a great way to get a feel for the latest fashion trends without having to spend the money.
I like to take photos while window shopping for clothes, so I can remember items that caught my eye and search for them later.

translations.meaning: đặt hàng và đến lấy tại cửa hàng

examples.sentence: I like to use click and collect when shopping for clothes, as it saves time and shipping costs.
I appreciate that the clothing store's click and collect service notifies me by email or text message when my order is ready for pickup.
If an item I want is not available in my size or preferred color in-store, I'll often use click and collect to order it online and pick it up when it's ready.
He used a virtual fitting room app to see how the shirt would look on him.
I always try on clothes in the fitting room before purchasing them to ensure the fit is right.
In the fitting room, I often take photos of myself in different outfits to get a second opinion from friends or family before making a purchase.
I love shopping for second-hand clothes because it's a more sustainable and eco-friendly option than buying new.
I like that shopping for second-hand clothes is a more budget-friendly option, as I can get high-quality items at a fraction of the cost of new clothes.
He donated his second hand clothes to a charity organization instead of throwing them away.
Impulse buys can be fun, but I always try to make sure the item fits well and matches my style before deciding.
When shopping for clothes, it's easy to get caught up in the excitement and make an impulse buy.
I've regretted impulse buys in the past, so now I try to stick to a shopping list and only buy items I've planned.
The store told me that the shoes I was looking for were out of stock and wouldn't be available in at least a month.
I was hoping to buy the jeans I saw online, but when I went to the store they were already out of stock.
The store had a sale, but most of the items had already been out of stock by the time I got there.

translations.meaning: đặt hàng trước (khi hàng sắp ra mắt)

examples.sentence: I like to pre-order clothes online so that I can be one of the first people to receive the latest styles.
I pre-ordered a dress for an upcoming event to make sure that it arrives in time and to avoid any last-minute incidents.
Pre-ordering clothes can sometimes come with exclusive discounts or offers, which is a nice bonus.

translations.meaning: đặt hàng (khi món hàng tạm hết)

examples.sentence: I had to back-order a pair of shoes that were sold out in my size, but I'm excited to receive them when they become available again.
I usually back-order clothes that are out of stock, just to make sure that I don't miss out on them if they become available again.
Back-ordering clothes requires patience, but it's worth it to receive a unique item that may not be available otherwise.
I had been saving up for weeks to buy the jacket I wanted, but by the time I went to purchase it, it was already sold out.
I was really disappointed to find out that the dress I wanted was sold out in all sizes and colors.
The limited edition T-shirt was so popular that it sold out within minutes.
Before making a purchase, I always comparison-shop for clothes to make sure I'm getting the best deal.
When comparison-shopping for clothes, I also pay attention to the quality of the fabric, not just the price.
With so many online shopping platforms nowadays, comparison-shopping for clothes has become easier and more convenient than ever.
